Package septogeddon.pluginquery.utils

Class EncryptionToolkit

java.lang.Object
septogeddon.pluginquery.utils.EncryptionToolkit
public class EncryptionToolkit extends Object
Encryption toolkit that holds both encryptor and decryptor Cipher
Author:
Thito Yalasatria Sunarya

    • readKey

      public static Key readKey(File file) throws IOException
      Read key from a File. Only file that are encoded using writeKey(File) or encode() can be read cause it contains encoded algorithm name.
      Parameters:
      file -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException

      public Key getKey()

    • encode

      public byte[] encode()
      Encode the EncryptionToolkit into byte array. The first byte is the length of algorithm name used for the encryption. The next bytes is the algorithm name itself and the encoded key.
      Returns:
